channel.title: Questionnaire on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Questionnaire on ZAP

item.title: Discovering Our Users - The ZAP User Personas Questionnaire
item.description: Join our journey to tailor ZAP for every user, by sharing your unique insights and experiences. Your perspective is the key to unlocking ZAP’s full potential for everyone in the cybersecurity community.

item.title: What Should We Focus On?
item.description: We want your input on what we should focus on as part of ZAP development.

item.title: Community Questionnaire Results
item.description: The results of the Community Questionnaire which we ran during the first half of 2021.
